Constructor Detail

CSVReader

public CSVReader(java.lang.String filepath,
                 java.lang.String filename)
Reads CVS-data from file and stores ist inside a vector of strings. Each element of this vector contains one line.

Parameters:
filepath -
filename -
Method Detail

parseCSVData

public void parseCSVData(char delimiter)
Parses the CVS-data inside the vector "lines" and stores it inside a vector of string arrays. Each element of the vector contains a string array containing the single columns of the cvs-data
